Discover the magic of Bruggi

An authentic retreat in the heart of the Italian mountains, where nature and tradition meet.

Welcome to Bruggi

History and Nature

Immersed in greenery at 1200m altitude, Bruggi is a place where time seems to have stopped. Discover our ancient history, culinary traditions, and breathtaking landscapes surrounding our small village. A unique experience for those seeking peace and beauty.

landscape 1200m Altitude history_edu Founded in 1400

Our Itineraries

Explore the most beautiful trails around the village

See all chevron_right

Historic Center Walk

easy

Discover the ancient architecture, churches, and hidden alleys of the town center.

timer 1h 15m hiking 2.000000km

Forest Retreat

medium

A deep dive into the silent pine forests. Great for forest bathing and bird watching.

timer 2h 45m hiking 6.000000km

Mills Trail

easy

A relaxing walk along the river to the ancient mill, perfect for families and picnics.

timer 2h 00m hiking 4.200000km

Bruggi Summit

hard

Challenging climb for experienced hikers offering the best panoramic views of the entire valley.

timer 6h 30m hiking 12.500000km
